data.text:
@wormmaps @CEPIvaccines So a needle in the arm will stop climate change?

You'd think all those addicts shooting up would have stopped it in its tracks by now mate
@wormmaps @CEPIvaccines moderna dna patent in covid = if Humans are making these virus = humanity is doomed
@wormmaps @PeterHotez @paimadhu Not that I disagree with what you tweeted but I'm not quite sure human kind will be around another century. https://t.co/cewco6iW8X

The work done by folks like @paimadhu and @PeterHotez speaking out about vaccine equity during the pandemic is just the start of this battle - it'll be a century-long one, with millions of lives likely hanging in the balance in LMICs.

(When I say our, I don't mean the royal we - here's our original study, led by @SadieRyan with a great team; you'll see these numbers and maps pop up at a few different points in the #ipcc report)

https://t.co/5dNuk1CiTN

We've known this problem was coming for years, though - as just one example, before the pandemic  started, Morgan Stanley was using our research to scout out billions in potential revenue from dengue vaccines in the U.S. and Europe.

https://t.co/001w2gN0l2 https://t.co/76nPHe9AmT
